title: Video: Oceaán – Neéd U
body:
When **Oceaán** first emerged back in July, **Neéd U** immediately became one of my favourite tracks of 2013.

Built on a smooth beat and stunning vocals, **Oceaán** demonstrated an innate ability to create a sound which reflects influences of How to Dress Well and James Blake.

**Neéd U** has now been given a visual element, with **Luca Rudlin** producing a video that matches the aesthetic of the track perfectly.  With the a vein of mystery coursing through the video, our interest in **Oceaán** only continues to grow.
